long_description: The Sunday Afternoons Riviera hat has a generous 4.5-in.-wide brim for excellent protection from the sun while you walk on the beach or work in the garden. Blend of paper, cotton and polyester provides UPF 50+ protection against harmful solar rays. Hat packs flat for travel and snaps back to shape when you're ready to wear it. Braided headband tie can be used to adjust the fit. Grosgrain sweatband wicks moisture off your brow.
short_description: The Sunday Afternoons Riviera hat has a generous 4.5-in.-wide brim for excellent protection from the sun while you walk on the beach or work in the garden.
